text:
Hi everyone,

A friend’s company is looking for a content writer to do a script for a long-form video (between 1,000 and 1,200 words). Bonus points if you’ve written for tech or about cybersecurity before. They are looking for someone to help with an initial script on short notice, with the potential for further work and collaboration if it is a good mutual fit. DM me if you’re interested and I can provide more details!
